name: Thekra
description: '''Thekra bint Mohammed Al Dali''' ({{langx|ar|ذكرى بنت محمد الدالي}}; September 16, 1966 – November 28, 2003), better known as '''Thekra''' ({{lang|ar|ذكرى}}),{{efn|Also romanized as '''Thikra''', '''Zekra''' or '''Zikra''', meaning "memory" or "memorial".}} was a Tunisian singer.
